sentences.en: A few horse-drawn carts still trundle through the dilapidated mining villages.
sentences.cn: 几架马车仍然在破落的矿村中曲折行进。

sentences.en: An untrained horse had taken fright at the sound of gunfire.
sentences.cn: 一匹未经训练的马听到枪响受了惊。

sentences.en: Around 1910 motorized carriages were beginning to replace horse-drawn cabs.
sentences.cn: 大约从1910年起，机动车开始取代马车。

sentences.en: As its rider tried to free it, the horse kicked out.
sentences.cn: 骑手想松开那匹马时，它乱踢乱蹬。

sentences.en: As they started up again, the horse broke into a brisk trot.
sentences.cn: 当他们又重新骑上马时，马突然轻快地小跑起来。

sentences.en: Both horse and rider were dripping with sweat within five minutes.
sentences.cn: 没过五分钟，马和骑手都大汗淋漓。

sentences.en: He injured his ribs in a tumble from his horse.
sentences.cn: 他从马背上摔下来时伤到了肋骨。

sentences.en: He was riding on his horse looking for the castle.
sentences.cn: 他正骑着马寻找那座城堡。

sentences.en: I let the horse drop his head to crop the spring grass.
sentences.cn: 我让马低下头啃吃春天的青草。

sentences.en: I thought nothing of betting £1,000 on a horse.
sentences.cn: 我认为把1,000英镑押在一匹马身上没什么了不起。

sentences.en: Last night we hitched the horse to the cart and moved here.
sentences.cn: 昨晚我们套上马车，拉着东西搬到了这里。

sentences.en: Lee had never ridden a horse before.
Operating systems can be brought to a halt by a Trojan Horse.
sentences.cn: 操作系统可能会因为木马病毒的攻击而中止。

sentences.en: Our horse had to be humanely destroyed after breaking his right foreleg.
sentences.cn: 我们的马摔断了右前腿，只好对它实行安乐死。

sentences.en: Stop horsing around and get to work.
The horse made a winning start for his new trainer.
sentences.cn: 这匹马为它的新驯马师开了个好头。

sentences.en: There was a loud thump as the horse crashed into the van.
sentences.cn: 马撞在货车上发出砰的一声巨响。

phrases.phrase: a horse of another color 或 a horse of a different color
phrases.tran_cn: 完全另一回事；其他事情

phrases.phrase: be on (one's) high horse 或 get on (one's) high horse
phrases.tran_cn: 趾高气扬，目空一切，盛气凌人

phrases.phrase: beat a dead horse 或 flog a dead horse
phrases.tran_cn: 白费口舌：在一件早已决定的事情上浪费口舌
黑马（出人意外获胜的赛马或参赛人）；（美）[政]“黑马”候选人（常因各方妥协而意外获得提名或当选）
预付的工资；旧债；无益的事
(谚)不要中流换马；不要在紧急关头改变策略
（消息）直接来自有关人士的，来自权威人士的
胡闹，捣蛋：沉溺胡闹或其他嬉戏活动
(英 谚)马有马道；物各尽其善，人各尽其能
可靠信息：原始的或勿庸置疑的信息来源
[希神]特洛伊木马；特洛伊木马（一种计算机病毒）
n. 白马；怀特霍斯（加拿大育空地区首府）；白马像（新石器时代、青铜时代或铁器时代雕刻在英国伯克郡等白垩山冈上）

phrases.phrase: you can lead (或take) a horse to water but you can'
phrases.tran_cn: (谚)牵马到水边易，逼马饮水难（你可以给人机会，但你不能逼他们去做）

trans.tran_cn: 马，骑马的军人，骑兵，有脚的架，跳马，鞍马
trans.tran_en: a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things
a large strong animal that people ride and use for pulling heavy things
